articles.author: Jean-Bernard Simeon, senior vice president and head of Europe, ViiV Healthcare
articles.title: Seeing more than HIV: A person-centered approach to HIV care - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: There’s more to the experience of living with HIV than suppressing the virus. Listening, valuing and integrating patient voices in HIV care is critical to leave no one behind.
articles.content: Progress made over the past 40 years has turned HIV from a death sentence into a manageable condition. Today, with regular treatment, people living with HIV can live and age well with HIV. The ground… [+10270 chars]
